Reviews.Title: “Good price, great location.”
Reviews.Author: Mamiricura
Reviews.Content: I know, I know most people will say that the place need renovations, yes indeed need it, but you can't beat the price and the location. The amazing ocean front location make it a very nice place to stay, anyway most of us just go straight to the beach and spend most of our time out of the room just get there to sleep and take a shower, so we don't need a fancy place. :)

Reviews.Title: “We will be back (again)!”
Reviews.Author: Lisa M
Reviews.Content: I am only writing this review because I am so tired of reading about people putting down this hotel, if you dont like it, stay elsewhere. Yes, it could use some updating, but it is a great location for price. We have been staying there for three years and love the location! The owners work every day and are great hosts! Thank you for another great weekend this year, we cant wait until we can come back!

Reviews.Title: “awesome trip”
Reviews.Author: richard b
Reviews.Content: just spent 6 days at the seascape and it was great. weve been going there for 10 years now and have not had any problems.when a couple people got a little to loud the staff took care of it. they even came up to me personally and said if the people are to noisy to call the office. they monitor the grounds all night long and the pool was kept very clean and the staff is hard working. anything i needed they got me. the place is a little old but if you want it remodeled then expect to pay higher prices. as for me and my family we only sleep in the room and it was clean. we like it so much i told my wife next year i would like to stay for 10 days.thanks for a great vacation sea scape. sincerely the boyers.

Reviews.Title: “Good location is all I can say!”
Reviews.Author: SamanthaR77
Reviews.Content: Parking is horrible. There looked to be about 60 spaces to park within their 3 parking lots. We got lucky and got one of them in the lot across the street. The hotel is very old and needs major updating. In our room, the carpet was dirty, so we definitely didn't walk on it barefoot. the inside lamp shades were dirty, bathtub was gross with couple rusted spots in it and stained black marks where shower mat lays. The vanity is all rusted. The bathroom floor was nice tile. The AC worked well. The beds were decent. Comforter had cigarette burn in it. All furniture and light fixtures are old. TV is old and small. We left lights on all night fearing there would be bugs but the only ones we seen were little ants. The private balcony is shared with all your neighbors on the whole side. The pool looks nice. The location is on the boardwalk/beach so thats best thing about the sea scape. Although the gentleman at front desk was nice we will spend the extra money and stay somewhere nicer next time.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ayemonet
Reviews.Content: Anyone who doesn't like their at the Sea Scape are complete MORONS. The room was very nice, and clean. The location is right on the boardwalk! It was very cheap! They have a pizzeria right below the place, & you get 20% off your entire meal for staying at the Sea Scape! The staff was extremely nice. The only problem we had is little kids were playing ball in the hall, the staff took care of that right away. Other then that, NO PROBLEMS! DEFINITELY RECCOMEND STAYING. STAYING AGAIN HERE NEXT YEAR!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice accommadations, very pleasent staff, nice location, right on the boards. Clean rooms very nice stay, nice pool table”
Reviews.Author: Eteacher1
Reviews.Content: Nice place on a budget, Right on the boards!!!! Had a nice stay great location right on the boards Clean rooms staff was great. Right in all the action. Will visit again Needs a little updating. Also needs better Wifi access. Couldnt connect in room (poor signal) Nice pool. Overall had a nice time. Staff was great.

Reviews.Title: “Best cheap motel near to the beach!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lukeneo71
Reviews.Content: It was great!! Good location . Great service.. The pool warn and clean .. Recomended !!! It has wifi !! We stayed 4 nights and everything was great!! Really close to the beach .. A few steps only.. The best part is the pool ..

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to come back”
Reviews.Author: Elnora W
Reviews.Content: We stay here for 3 days, and were very pleased. First we had a lot of stuff to carry to our room, Jonny helped us unload the truck. My husband is in a band that had 3 gigs that weekend. Jonny was a great help to getting all that stuff to the room on the second floor. Great thing this place has a elevator. This place is right on the boardwalk. We have stayed here time and time again for over that last 8 years. The price has always been affordable. I have read some of the other reviews and don't understand what folks are looking for. We have never had a bad time here and are looking forward to our next stay.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Harpers Ferry, West Virginia, United States
Reviews.Title: “Great location but defiantly needs alot of TLC”
Reviews.Author: hlancaster71
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week and I must say it was a enjoyable stay. The location is perfect its about half way on the whole boardwalk. Pool is wonderful and very clean. Our room was very comfortable and quiet, only complaint would be the bathroom ceiling kept leaking and flooding the entire bathroom floor everytime the guest above us would shower. We come to ocean city yearly for the week and defiantly plan to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for a great week....”
Reviews.Author: Renee S
Reviews.Content: The price of the motel is very affordable and the people who work there are very friendly. The motel is located in the center of the board walk and you are just within walking distance of all the boardwalk has to offer. The motel is older...It is clean and everything is in working order.It suits our needs . We will be staying here again and recommending it to our friends....

Reviews.Title: “When you think of a crappy motel on the side of the road in the middle of no where, this place should be a prime example.”
Reviews.Author: Angelica71691
Reviews.Content: The rooms are filled with bugs, there were flies and two huge moths in our room. The motel has the image like it hasn't been renovated since the 50's. We were scared to sleep at night because of the bugs. It smelled really bad and the showers were filthy and rusted. We turned on the water in the shower and all the hair from the drain came out. Its such a shame that this motel is a disgrace because it is in such a great location right on the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it here!!”
Reviews.Author: Erin P
Reviews.Content: We decided to go down to Ocean City for our first time ever and stayed at this motel and we loved it!! The price was really great and the people were very friendly! Our room was very clean and the pool was nice and warm! I will definitely be staying here again hopefully at the end of the summer. I would recommend this place to any family trying to get away on a budget. It is by no means a fancy place but it surved its purpose for us. Thank you for such a wonderful week!

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
Reviews.Title: “summer vacation !!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Doris R
Reviews.Content: we love sea scape !!!!!! 12 years and many more to come !!!!!!! and the price even better !! ...my 12 year old boy ,my huby ,and I simply enjoy it @ sea scape ......Gracias .

Reviews.Title: “good for the price”
Reviews.Author: PaGringa
Reviews.Content: very good for the price. we rented the 1 room cottage.it was clean and we had daily maid service. ive staid in other cheap hotels before, but this one was the best. if u want a fancey place this might not be the place for u. we will be going back.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!! Was afraid to stay there!!”
Reviews.Author: Jeanie M
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay here on a last minute decision. We checked in and got the key and found out that parking was horrible. If you got alot of luggage you better hope you can walk a ways. Second, this motel felt like I was in the ghettos or projects. It was unreal. I had my 3 year old granddaughter with us and was petrified to stay there with her. We got to our room and oh my god the smell when you opened the door was enough to gag you. I checked out the bathroom and the tub was full of rust stains and the ceiling tiles were covered in black mold and mildew. The refrigerator door did not shut and the little freezer had a inch thick ice on it. So that did not work. This was totally unacceptable!!!!! I went to the front office and complained and decided I just wanted my money back and would leave even if that meant we drove back home. They wanted to offer me something at a later date as a credit and I said no way I will not be coming back. The management tried to explain and blame the whole situation on the cleaning team (oh and let me tell you...they were young girls in hoochie shorts and tank tops). I told them that it wasn't the cleaning crew's fault. The manager also said they have someone come in and spray for the mold and mildew. I said, "then why didn't you spend the extra money to replace the ceiling tile?" He said and I quote "it's not the tile, it's what above the tiles." Needless to say that was enough for me. I can't even imagine whats above the tiles or in the walls!! DO NOT GO THERE!!! ITS DANGEROUS TO YOU AND YOUR HEALTH!!!!

Reviews.Title: “11 years and counting”
Reviews.Author: janis s
Reviews.Content: I have been staying here for 11 years and have never had a problem. The maid service is perfect. They even make teddy bears out of towels for the kids. I would rather spend my money on fun then an expensive room. what more do you need then a shower, queen size beds, refrigerator, kitchen table, maid servie, cable tv a pool and an office that is very friendly. I have never had a problem with cleanliness in 11 years

Reviews.Title: “Eww!”
Reviews.Author: Courthalecki6
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 2 nights, The shower leaked and was dirty and I would not go to the bathroom there! This place was a dump! No blankets, Moldy smell, Rude employees, NEVER again!

Reviews.Title: “Our stay”
Reviews.Author: leasap211
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend knew about this place from previous years of staying here with his family! We reserved the hotel from Friday to Monday had a wonderful time! The comments of it not being clean are just people who expect to get more than what they paid for. They are a little old fashion but people need to remember this is one of the first hotels built in ocean city. The rates are affordable and the owners do not bother you. If you need anything u either go get it urself or call down but ppl do not disturb you either...we will be back thanks for a great weekend!! The leach's and Saphore's!

Reviews.Title: “Really”
Reviews.Author: CR H
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed in the 2 bedroom apartments. There was two bedrooms but only one had an air conditioner. There was no phone nor clock in the apartment. There was a dining room table with two chairs. The refrigerator was rusty and there was not any utensils, pots or pans or dishes. The bathroom wall had mildew all over it. The furniture was old, very old. The walls had stains and the bathroom had rusting tiles on the ceiling. There were flies in the apartment as soon as we opened the front door. There was beer bottle caps located in the grass by the front door. Housekeeping services are limited. One small television within the apartment. Had some problems with the tv signals. The window coverings were minimal and did not completely shut. At night, someone walking by could see into the room. Pros - the swimming pool was available for use. The hotel location is one block from the boardwalk. Lots of closet space. Can accomodate upto 10 people.

Reviews.Title: “disaster”
Reviews.Author: lala060864
Reviews.Content: we stayed in apt. dirty carpets and furniture, refridgerator was all rusty and filthy. carpets dirty and unkept, furniture broken tv had no remote, kitchen filthy and had no utensils as stated(wouldnt eat there anyway) had bad oder. other tenants loud most of the nightand one had his way with his mrs on front porch in front of anyone looking. bathroom had black mold growing on cieling and on wall. when went ot mgr he said he was unaware of condtion and no other rr=oom available and would not refund our money . if pictures are requiresd we have pics of everything!!!!!! parking very hard to find

Reviews.Title: “The worst place I have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: atraveler60811
Reviews.Content: This was the worst place I have ever stayed in. I went with my girlfriend for a quick weekend trip to the beach for her birthday. Too bad we arrived so late or we would have left immediately. The room, which was originally described as "overlooking the pool" was actually an "inside" room which meant that there was a giant window with a broken curtain into... the hallway. In the morning, everyone on the floor walked by the window with only a curtain that barely covered the window between them and us in bed! In addition, there were stains all over the carpet, bed - pretty much anything fabric had stains on it. The toilet hardly flushed, and the water in the shower never got hot. The whole place smelled like sweaty teenagers in a bowling alley. The bed was miserable - I could feel every spring. Thank God I drank enough alcohol or I wouldn't have gotten a wink of sleep. They will charge you for a late checkout, and if you aren't out 15 minutes prior to checkout, they call your room to hurry you along. We could hear everything through the walls and doors, including people walking on the floor above us, and the cleaning girls vacuuming in the morning. To boot, the place was an outrageous $145 per night. Go to one of the places next door and pay a little extra - this place is a D.U.M.P! Absolutely not worth one penny.

Reviews.Title: “It"s old, retro, and totally awesome!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Heathbar1984
Reviews.Content: I"ve been staying at this motel since 2003, theyve always made me happy!!!!! The rooms are always wat u need or want, and very reasonable, i see no point in paying $300 a nite for 2 beds a bathroom, and a balcony just cuz its name brand!!!!! Had a breezeway room last visit have pool side in 2011! Remember You came for the beach, boards, and fun, so why blow ur fun mony on the courtyard!!!!! Will always be a patron of this wonderful oldschool motel

Reviews.Title: “Great Price for location”
Reviews.Author: catpaws123
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the sea scape for many years now and have never had a problem , the rooms , the staff and owners are all wonderful people , keeping the rates as low as they can to help people like myself able to stil enjoy the ocean. (on the ocean ) To those of you who have a problem you are just a want to be rich person .. If you think your all that go stay at the Hilton we don't want you there anyway I bet your own house looks like some shack. So take your high faluting *** somewhere else!!!!!!! LOVE YOU SEA SCAPE!!!!!!!!!! Donna Richards

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely The Place To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Shanxxbby
Reviews.Content: I have stayed there one time and I will definitely be returning back in August of 2011. The rooms are tidy, and the staff are wonderful. You can't expect to have rooms like at the Hilton for as cheap as these prices are. You won't have extravagant rooms unless you pay hundreds a night somewhere else. Who comes to Ocean City to sit in the rooms all day anyhow, it's basically a place to get cleaned up and sleep. This is the best place to stay, it's directly near the ocean & boardwalk. Come on now, if this place was that bad my teenage daughters would be the first to complain, but they absolutely loved it and everyone should. Just because the hotel may mess up a few times doesn't mean anything. You should try balancing bills, finances, reservations, check-in & check-out's, staff, and etc. I bet you wouldn't be perfect either. But as I say everyone should love this hotel , at least give it a shot !

Reviews.Title: “A CHEAP PROSTITUTE SPOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: REDEYE420247
Reviews.Content: I just recently came back from Ocean City MD and was very eexcited to go until I got to the hotel! The whole hotel needs a bath and the rooms was stuffy and smelled like they had a bad rain stoem in the room we were staying in! To sum it all up this hotel reminds you of The hooker on the point the HBO specail that's all I could think about! I dislike the place so much that I cut my vacation short and came home 2 days early!

Reviews.Title: “It was absolutley great.”
Reviews.Author: steelerswoninmyeyes
Reviews.Content: The Sea Scape was wonderful. Very Very clean rooms. The pool is very nice. The location is great. You are on the Boardwalk but far enough away from all the crazies on down the board walk. Already looked at booking a room there for next year. Will stay there everyyear. Please Ocean City don't ever tear this place down and build something that your modern everyday family can not afford. Thanks Stacey

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: happyhollsHull
Reviews.Content: we have just returned from a 5 day break and all i have is praise for this hotel it was very clean with excellent service and food yes there was the odd squeaky floorboard but its 15oyrs old and it added to the charecter all staff were very helpfull and pleasent i can truly say we had a wondefull time and hope to see them all again soon thanks all for a great time xx

Reviews.Title: “Poor service”
Reviews.Author: Rayrock2010
Reviews.Content: If you ever get resevations at this place,make sure you get the room you want in writing.they overbook the efc. Rooms and when you get thier the put you in another room and say made a mistake but they give you nothing in return,so make sure before you make your payment at the office,you get the room you want because thier is no refunds or they won't give you a deal.hade to throw away almost all of the food we bought to put in the room .the management is unprofessional.I hear other guest complain about over booking the rooms because once you are thier, what are you going to do go home?like I said make sure you have your ro before you pay

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT AND WILL RETURN”
Reviews.Author: flowerfairie
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend stayed there last summer and had the best time ever. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We got to know one of the owners pretty well. The room i thought was nice. We plan to keep going there year after year. What can i say it is right near everything!!!!!!!!! We also enjoy going to Pepper Jacks and getting drinks, and being right there at our motel!!

Reviews.Title: “best location and price”
Reviews.Author: Xerox3393
Reviews.Content: looking at most of the negative remarks, i would like to add something. People know that they are paying nominal price for the rooms at boardwalk, and they want the best out of it. Well there might certainly be some loopholes but the service they provide is not that bad. we enjoyed our stay there. and for the price and location i would recommend my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Keep on Looking”
Reviews.Author: FamilyTravelerFromPA
Reviews.Content: How can I say better what was said in most of the reviews already posted? This place is not for you unless you would rather feel like you're camping in a run-down cabin in the woods instead of a hotel on the boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “NASTY!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: damlatina
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Ocean City, MD for about 8 years now and have never stayed at the Sea Scape. Friends of ours recommended the Sea Scape because of the location and the fact that a large group from church would be staying there. What a mistake!! When we first arrived the staff appeared to be confused and there were lots of people in the lobby upset about there rooms and service. The manager was very nasty. The prices were different from the ones quoted over the phone. My family and I got an apartment because we were planning to do some cooking. We wasted our money and our food went bad. The stove did not work, the refrigerator did not work and the air condition did no work. The rooms were very depressing, dirty, and they smelled. We took our own bed sheets (thank God). But even doing this did not prevent from my grandson getting bitting by bugs. There was a total of 40 of us and we all have decided not to return.

Reviews.Title: “Cant wait to come back”
Reviews.Author: Getslayerized
Reviews.Content: I found this motel by luck last spring, i went to ocean city to fish on the pier and was really tired but wanted to try my luck first thing next morning. I drove for a bit looking for the "dated-looking" motels and pulled in there. To my suprise they had there spring special going on.. 35 bucks a night for a breezeway room. I would be happy with a tent in ocean city for that price. Rooms were clean and employees were friendly. I enjoyed my stay and im going back again in a few weeks (when the 35 a night thing starts again)

Reviews.Title: “Stinky, muggy,and depressing”
Reviews.Author: greenboy411
Reviews.Content: My wife and I planned a quick get away with our kids to have some fun in the sun. But when we check into the room, a smell smacked me in the face. A stinch of urine and ben gay. The room looks like a crack house from the T.V. cops. The furniture had a mold smell as if they were left out in the rain and brougt back in the room, it had a mildew smell. DO NOT STAY THERE.

Reviews.Title: “It is the Bates Motel on the Boardwalk”
Reviews.Author: mrsklz
Reviews.Content: We were very dissappointed with the Sea Scape. When we walked into our brown, paneled room, a very dismal, dreary feeling came over us. The room was in no way pleasant to look at - not what you expect from a room at the beach. The bathtub continually dripped and the toilet gurgled. I brought my own sheets and blankets and boy I am glad I did. When I changed the hotel provided linens, a huge moth flew out from under the fitted sheet. It was so big I found myself ducking so that it did not hit me. A family of many stayed above us. The children running coupled with the floors and ceilings allowing every sound to be heard, kept us awake until well after 2 in the morning. In addition, when they sat on their balcony, they smoked cigarrettes and drank I do not know what, which all ended up on my clothes that were drying on the balcony chairs. The air conditioner did not work effectively, caused us to sweat thru most of the day and well into the night. For the kind of money this hotel charges, you can surely find better, more suitable accommodations. Do not stay here - I never will again.

Reviews.Title: “awful customer service, dirty rooms, pool dirty, don't ever stay there”
Reviews.Author: nl58
Reviews.Content: awful customer service, dirty rooms, pool dirty, don't ever stay there, room smelled, bed uncomfortable, bathroom had lots of permanent stains, dingy lighting, there are many more hotels in this area that have more quality for the same amount of money

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: aturkeywoman
Reviews.Content: We have been staying there for the last 6 years and are planning on going there again this year as long as gas prices don't go further than they are now.We always had a good time.We only used room to sleep and watch TV, Most of time is on beach or boardwalk.The people in office are nice enough to make coffeee and help you in any way they can, And we thank them for keeping prices down to where you can afford to stay there.Plus we love sitting on balcony watching the water.I can not wait to go this year...

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is a mess ant worth the cost”
Reviews.Author: B_RAD_8
Reviews.Content: the hotel service was terribble and the rooms we to small and messy and the bath rooms have sludge in the walls and in the sink and my mini freezer didnt work and its one of the worst hotels on the boardwalk

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely do NOT stay here - Rude/Discriminatory Staff”
Reviews.Author: AnthonyGulino
Reviews.Content: My review for the Sea Scape only goes so far as the main lobby, because after having a room reserved for over two months, we were not permitted to check into our room. Here is what happened. My brother and I, he is 27, I am 22, both males, made reservations with the Sea Scape back in June to stay there in mid August. We made the reservations for an Ocean Front room with a balcony, and the motel associate was able to accommodate our request. The only thing we were asked on the phone is, "Are you two adults?", and I responded that yes we were. We paid our deposit, got our confirmation, we were all set. Well, upon arrival, the very nasty motel manager, who immediately took a negative attitude with my brother and I as soon as we set foot in the lobby, sneered at us that we were not allowed to have an Ocean Front room, that the Sea Scape does not rent balconies to "singles". I explained to the man that I was never asked on the phone whether or not we were two single people, and he showed me our reservation card - someone had marked "male/female couple" on our card. Yet I was never asked that on the phone. Clearly, I would not lie on the phone, and then drive nearly 7 hours to Ocean City to try to break the rules and get into our motel. Had we been asked if we were two single people, we would have said yes, and made reservations elsewhere. But rather than trying to be understanding, the motel manager yelled at us, and told us that we were kids and we would be having parties on our balcony, throwing beer bottles, and inviting girls up off the board for a party. He judged us based on our young appearance, and called us both trouble makers and liars in front of other motel workers and guests. This was truly an embarrassing and appalling situation. He insisted that whoever took our reservation on the phone asked us if we were a couple, and implied that we lied when we made our reservation. He threw a key at us which was for a first floor, side view room, and told us to go look at it. We could have that room if we wanted, but not the room with the balcony that we reserved some two months ago. We obliged and looked at the room - it was small, dirty, in a horrible location, and we wanted nothing to do with it. After returning to the office and having to listen to this old shyster accuse us of lying and planning to have parties and destroy his motel room, my brother and I left and found reservations elsewhere, an Ocean Front balcony room at the lovely Sahara Motel (the same kind of room we were denied access to at the Sea Scape). The workers there were more than kind, and they too were appalled at how we were treated at the Sea Scape. I knew the Sea Scape was less than appealing looking on the outside, but who knew that we would find the staff to be just as despicable as the rooms. My family and I have been coming to Ocean City, MD since I was born, and we have never had anything less than exceptional stays on the boardwalk. Never in my life have I been treated so poorly, and embarrassed so much in front of other people. To be chided for something you have done is one thing - to be called liars and accused of doing something before we even do it is another thing entirely. We will be contacting the Ocean City Chamber of Commerce to let them know what a black mark this experience has made on their resort, and how poorly the manager of the Sea Scape has represented Ocean City. Simply because my brother and I were young, we were immediately discriminated against, called liars, and denied the reservations that we made months in advance. What's more, it was done in such a demeaning and embarrassing way. I wish the experience we had in that motel lobby on no one. So in closing, I plead that everyone hear this story and take your business elsewhere! I will be doing everything I can to dissuade anyone from staying at this wretched place, and giving this bitter and bigoted old man any money whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: “Mites all over the place lawsuit is coming”
Reviews.Author: angelslildevilxx
Reviews.Content: That place is horrible we stayed in room 108 and it always felt moist in the room there was some kindof mold growing under the sink. The maid never came in to our room and I started getting bites on my arms. Then when I went home I still had the bites and were geting more my friends stayed another night in the room and and I calle dher and said I think the motel has bed begs so she tore the beds apart and she said she saw some bugs one was long and had legs on the side and the other was big and brown like a tick and I had found one like the tick one in my cltohes from the motel and I continued to get bit up at home I had to fumigate my apartment wash all my linens in my apartment becuase they had come with us from Ocean city. That motel is horrible for the sake of your children do not stay there. I am sueing.

Reviews.Title: “Could be worse”
Reviews.Author: jlmiller33173
Reviews.Content: This motel is not a bad place to stay for the price of the rooms. It is basically a "go there to sleep" type deal. I will continue to stay at this motel because of the proximity to the boardwalk and the price. We have stayed here a couple if different times and have never had a bad experience.

Reviews.Title: “What a staff !!!”
Reviews.Author: bikedoctor
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here for bike week ,, and i recomend you do the same ,, the staff was so nice to all the bikers and they even reserve parking for the bikes , they had the whole parking lot just for bikes and handicaped people , . we had friends staying other places in ocean city that night and when they came to visit us , and found out what we paid they were wanting to book a room for next year ,, we wil fill that place up next year and the years to come ,, i also stayed there for the fourth of july and found that for the price you can't beat it ,, looking forward to next year ,, they even helped me with a place for my trailer and truck , i have stayed in motels that don't even garentee parking ,,, not the holliday inn , but it is not $300 a nite either ,,,

Reviews.Title: “Stinky, Noisy and Dirty”
Reviews.Author: AJJoy
Reviews.Content: Yes, we did have an ocean view, especially since we stayed out of the room as much as possbile!! We walked the steps every time because the stench in the elevator was disgusting. The carpet in our room was smelly and dirty. In fact the hotel should be gutted and rebuilt. Also, everyday we had to beg for ice , (I found that when I went down in my low cut bathing suit I didn't have to beg and was given two scoops instead of one). Also, every night there was noisy people passing our window and fighting down below during their football game. This happened every nite between 2:00 and 5:30am. You could not pay us to stay there again!!

Reviews.Title: “not a good place for children but cheap prices!!”
Reviews.Author: lilcutie1285
Reviews.Content: my hubbY AND i was ocean view room but the room was so small only a lil itty bitty fridge no coffee maker they charged you 10 dollars for a remote which you got back after checkout but they should include that with room rate, the bathroom was the size of the closet, when you walk in and turn the light on the light is the size of a night light the tv was small the stopper in the bathtub didnt work lil bugs fly around the air worked but there was no heatso i would freeze the bed squeaked and you had to literally slam the door for it to close or put your key in the knob and hold it while you shut it the staff was very nice the walls were paper thin the only thing that was good was that it was on the board walk and the staff is very polite O and the shower has great water pressure. but i didnt like the place at all its for a cheap place to stay if you dont want to pay much i know its a place to stay for a lil while but you are suppose to be comfortable with your stay i wont stay there ever again!!!

Reviews.Title: “after 13 years im very dissappointed....”
Reviews.Author: pinkdolfyn
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the sea scape for 13 years and after the last 2 times i will never go back. the first time we had gotten there my husband and i and my 2 children, and my sister in-law her husband and child, had put a deposit down on a balcony effic. to find out when we got there it had been given to someone else,so they offered us an apartment across the street for the same rate which wasnt even on the boardwalk and it was filthy. and last year it was just my family we rented a single room and the carpet was so dirty and sticky my 1 year olds socks were black so we took the bed spreads off the beds and layed them on the floor. I was so turned off on the place after that. I will never after 13 years go back it used to be a well kept place and it has an excellent pizza shop I will give 5 stars to but i wouldnt recomend the sea scape not for 130 $ a night. you couldnt pay me to stay there ever again.

Reviews.Title: “not a bad place to stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed here several times. We have never had a problem It's not the Ritz but for what you pay it's not bad. We have alway's felt safe here. For the vacationer with a little money it's the place to stay, Rooms are small but they are clean

Reviews.Title: “DONT EVER STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: First of all, the sea scape charged me and my girlfriends $90 for a room, and charged another family $50 for the same room. They asked for a $125 deposit on the room and asked noone else for one that was staying there at the time. The manager told us that because we were all girls we were not allowed to have a room with a balcony. The next morning when we went to check out they told us that they were keeping the security deposit because we were too loud. We talked to the people in neighboring rooms and they said that they hadn't heard a peep out of us. Our room was in immaculate condition we left it exactly as it was when we arrived. They kept our security deposit anyway! The rooms were very tiny and pretty creepy looking but the owners will scam you if they can! They are sexist to girls and took our money!

Reviews.Title: “Kinda on the dingy side”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It is less expensive than some hotels that are located right on the ocean front but I can see why. The halls are dark and dingy but the rooms are kept nice and everything worked in the room. The maintenance man we met in the hall really seemed to appreciate people and helped assist us several times. Overall not such a bad place, just not the best place to stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Sea Scape Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 1503 Boardwalk, Ocean City, MD 21842
